snippet: Those who had a hand in the passage of President Obama’s health care law are now finding lucrative work in the private sector, as businesses try to understand the complex measure or profit from it.
abstract: Former Obama administration and Congressional officials who were immersed in passage of health care reform law are now finding lucrative work as consultants in private sector, helping businesses understand, and profit from, complex measure; critics cite such career moves as proof that Pres Obama has not lived up to his promise to change culture of influence peddling in Washington.
lead_paragraph: Those who had a hand in the passage of President Obama’s health care law are now finding lucrative work in the private sector, as businesses try to understand the complex measure or profit from it.

headline.main: Reaping Profit After Assisting on Health Law
headline.print_headline: Reaping Profit After Assisting On Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
